title Sequence Diagram: 09 Modify Venue - basic

actor "Organizer" as o
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>nv2 : View " as nv2
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_>m : Model" as m
entity "<link:_>m2 : Model" as m2

control "<link:_>: EventController" as vc

entity "<link:_>vdto : ModifyVenueDTO" as vdto


participant "<link:_> : VenueRepository" as vr

participant "<link:_>: EventService" as vs

entity "<link:_>v: Venue" as v


==1. The organizer selects the modify venue functionality on the view venue page **(22 - venues - organizer)**==


o -> w: click()
activate w

w->d:GET(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->vc:modifyVenue(vId: long, m : Model)
activate vc

vc -> vs: getVenue(vId: long)
vs -> vr: findVenueById (vId: long)
vs -->vc: return v


vc->m: addAttribute("venue" : String, v : Venue)

vc->*vdto: ModifyVenueDTO()
activate vdto

vdto-->vc:
deactivate vdto
vc->m: addAttribute("vDTO" : String, vdto : ModifyVenueDTO)

vc-->d:return "modify-venue" **(24 - modify - venue - organizer)**
deactivate vc
d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d

==2. The system displays the modify venue page **(24 - modify - venue - organizer)** which shows the details of the selected venue as editable fields\n3. The user enters the updated details of the venue==

o -> w: click()

w->d:POST(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->vc:modifyVenue(vdto : ModifyVenueDTO, m2 : Model)

activate vc

vc -> vs: v := getVenue(venueName : String)

vc -> vs: modifyVenue(vdto : ModifyVenueDTO, v : Venue)

activate vs
vs->v:setName(newVenueName: String)
vs->v:setAddress(newAddress: String)
vs->v:setCapacity(newCapacity: Integer)

vs->v:setManagerName(newManagerName: String)

vs->v:setManagerNumber(newManagerNumber: Integer)

vs->v:setManagerEmail(newManagerEmail: String)

vs->vr:save(v : Venue)
vs-->vc:
deactivate vs

vc->m2: addAttribute("venue" : String, v : Venue)

vc-->d:return "venue-details" **(23 - check - venues - organizer)**
deactivate vc
d->*nv2:View(m2 : Model)
activate nv2


nv2-->d:
deactivate nv2

d-->w:return nv2
deactivate d

==4. The system displays the venue details page **(23 - check - venues - organizer)** with the updated details of the venue==
